SELECT t1.`name`, t1.sort, t1.type, t1.selectable_values, t2.NAME groupName, t3.NAME categoryName FROM `pms_attribute` t1 LEFT JOIN pms_attribute_group t2 ON t1.attribute_group_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN pms_category t3 ON t2.category_id = t3.id
t1.is_deleted = 0
AND ( t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') OR t2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') OR t3.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') )
AND t1.attribute_group_id = #{queryParams.groupId}
ORDER BY t2.sort DESC, t1.sort DESC
